metadata.title: CVE-2021-36769 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A reordering issue exists in Telegram before 7.8.1 for Android, Telegrambefore 7.8.3 for iOS, and Telegram Desktop before 2.8.8. An attacker cancause the server to receive messages in a different order than they weresent a client.

criterions.comment: telegram-desktop package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
